name: Vampire Survivors: ARES
description:
Rediscover Vampire Survivors trought this extension!

Use the elements to defeat the hordes of ennemies and survive the longest time possible.

Discover new weapons and powers, a new map and new ennemies to beat.

Will you success to survive against them ?




Controls : 

Z/Q/S/D to move.

Left Mouse Button to select new weapons and powers.

GitHub page : 

https://github.com/E-artsup/VampireSurvivorUpdate
